titleInfo.title: Was Arrested and Brough to the Jail.

mods.abstract: WAS ARRESTED AND BROUGHT TO the jail of this parish, on the 9th inst., a griff who says his name is TOM, and that he belongsto Mr, Lumb, of the parish of Concordia, of the parish of Concordia. Said griff is about five feet six inches high, and about 36 years of age, The owner is requested to come forward, prove property, pay charges, and take him away, otherwise he will be disposed of according to law. MARCELIN AGUILLARD. Jailor.

detail.title: Pointe Coupee Democrat. : (False River [i.e. New Roads], Parish of Pointe Coupee [La.]) 1858-1862
